text: Vitry may refer to: ==People== * Jacques de Vitry (c. 1160–1240), French chronicler and cardinal * Henryk Vitry, pen name of Tadeusz Żakiej (1915–1994), Polish food writer * Philippe de Vitry (1291–1361), French composer, music theorist and poet * Simhah ben Samuel of Vitry (died 1105), French Talmudist and the compiler of the Mahzor Vitry == Communes in France== ===Haute-Marne departement=== * Vitry-en-Montagne * Vitry-lès-Nogent ===Marne departement=== * Vitry-en-Perthois * Vitry-la-Ville * Vitry-le-François ===Saône-et-Loire departement=== * Vitry-en-Charollais * Vitry-lès-Cluny * Vitry-sur-Loire ===In other departements=== * Vitry-aux-Loges, in the Loiret departement * Vitry-en-Artois, in the Pas-de-Calais departement * Vitry- Laché,in the Nièvre departement * Vitry-le-Croisé, in the Aube departement * Vitry-sur-Orne, in the Moselle departement * Vitry-sur-Seine, in the Val-de- Marne departement ==Other uses== * Simhah ben Samuel of Vitry (the Mahzor Vitry), a Jewish prayer book manuscript of the early 12th century, attributed to Rabbi Simhah ben Samuel of Vitry
title: Vitry
